name: Broken Escape
description:
Control:
E - Interact;
F - Take  / Throw container;
Shift - Sprint.

Tasks:
- Fix all devices whenever possible to avoid destroying the station;
- Refuel rescue shuttle and escape;
- Restore energy containers in energy machine;
- Dont die.

Also:
Music and half sounds will be available soon.
All graphic and code are made by me.
